Monday, May 1, 2023.Breakfast: Pain Perdu - French-style French toast made with thick slices of brioche soaked in a sweet egg mixture and cooked to golden brown
Monday, May 1, 2023.Lunch: Muffuletta Sandwich - Layers of salami, mortadella, provolone cheese, and olive salad on a large round Italian bread
Monday, May 1, 2023.Dinner: Rosemary Garlic Roast Chicken - Roasted whole chicken marinated with rosemary, garlic, and olive oil, served with roasted baby potatoes and green beans
Monday, May 1, 2023.Dessert: Chocolate Chip Cookies - Store-bought chocolate chip cookies

Tuesday, May 2, 2023.Breakfast: Bacon and Egg Empanadas - Flaky pastry filled with scrambled eggs, bacon, and cheese, baked until golden brown
Tuesday, May 2, 2023.Lunch: Serrano Ham and Manchego Panini - Thinly sliced Serrano ham, Manchego cheese, and arugula on a grilled ciabatta roll
Tuesday, May 2, 2023.Dinner: Moussaka - Greek baked dish with layers of eggplant, seasoned ground beef, and béchamel sauce

Wednesday, May 3, 2023.Breakfast: Oeufs en Cocotte - Baked eggs with cream, Gruyère cheese, and diced ham, served with toasted baguette
Wednesday, May 3, 2023.Lunch: Catalan Tomato Bread - Rustic bread rubbed with ripe tomatoes, drizzled with olive oil, and topped with Serrano ham
Wednesday, May 3, 2023.Dinner: Paella Valenciana - Saffron-infused rice dish with chicken, rabbit, and a variety of vegetables
Wednesday, May 3, 2023.Dessert: Rice Krispies Treats - Store-bought marshmallow cereal bars

Thursday, May 4, 2023.Breakfast: Breakfast Strata - Layered casserole with bread, eggs, cheese, and cooked sausage, baked until golden and puffy
Thursday, May 4, 2023.Lunch: Panzanella Salad - Tuscan salad with toasted bread, ripe tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and basil in a red wine vinaigrette
Thursday, May 4, 2023.Dinner: Chicken Piccata - Pan-fried chicken cutlets with a lemon, caper, and white wine sauce, served over pasta
Thursday, May 4, 2023.Dessert: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies - Store-bought oatmeal raisin cookies

Friday, May 5, 2023.Breakfast: Granola, Fruit, and Nut Parfait - Layers of granola, fresh fruit, and Greek yogurt topped with honey and toasted nuts
Friday, May 5, 2023.Lunch: Prosciutto, Brie, and Fig Jam Sandwich - Thinly sliced prosciutto, creamy Brie, and sweet fig jam on a crusty baguette
Friday, May 5, 2023.Dinner: Ratatouille - Classic French vegetable dish with eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and tomatoes, served with grilled chicken and crusty bread
Friday, May 5, 2023.Dessert: Key Lime Pie - Store-bought key lime pie

Saturday, May 6, 2023.Breakfast: Avocado Toast with Poached Eggs - Creamy avocado spread on toasted whole-grain bread, topped with poached eggs and a sprinkle of chili flakes
Saturday, May 6, 2023.Lunch: Tuscan White Bean Soup - Hearty soup with cannellini beans, vegetables, and pancetta, served with crusty bread
Saturday, May 6, 2023.Dinner: Chicken Marsala - Pan-fried chicken cutlets with a Marsala wine and mushroom sauce, served with garlic mashed potatoes and steamed asparagus

Sunday, May 7, 2023.Breakfast: Frittata - Italian-style omelette with spinach, sun-dried tomatoes, and feta cheese
Sunday, May 7, 2023.Lunch: Bocadillo de Jamón - Spanish-style sandwich with Serrano ham, Manchego cheese, and a drizzle of olive oil on a crusty baguette
Sunday, May 7, 2023.Dinner: Pastitsio - Greek baked pasta dish with layers of pasta, seasoned ground beef, and béchamel sauce
